title: Adverse Reaction to Covid Vaccine - Best Acupuncture Hamilton NZ
author: Szenan Phua; Acupuncturist Hamilton
description: In this video Daisy talks about adverse reaction to the covid vaccine. Call 07 846 7956 to make an appointment at Centre of Balance.
cleaned_text: Vaccine ](https://balancetcm.co.nz/adverse-reaction-to-covid-vaccine-acupuncture-hamilton-auckland/) In this video Daisy talks about a patient she treated who had an adverse reaction to the Covid-19 Vaccination. If you have any health issues that require attention, Centre of Balance is open from Tuesday to Saturday. We have clinics in Hamilton, and Auckland and we can do online consultations for international patients. Call 07 846 7956 to book an appointment or email us at info@balancetcm.co.nz.
